function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Architects and engineers lacking training in public health may lead to designs with inadequate sunlight access impacting indoor viral institutions."},{"Description":"Inadequate utilization of natural ventilation and filtration systems may result in an unhealthy indoor environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of viral and bacterial managers, infection control specialists.","Owner":"Construction companies, healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"Limited incorporation of sunlight into lighting designs in healthcare control.","Technologies":"Daylighting design tools, energy-efficient lighting systems.","People":"Architects, lighting designers, healthcare facility managers.","Owner":"Architectural firms, healthcare facility management."}]}
